about_the_game:
25 Heroes

Each hero has its own characteristics and playability, there have no weak heroes, only have the combinations you can't think of.

50 Treasures

Collect treasures! A reasonable mix of treasures will turn the adventurer into the dragon killer!

6 Dragons

Each dragon has the ultimate power. Defeat them and save the world!

Game Features

·Many map chapters allow the player to choose, the player can choose different routes on each map, and different routes will have different heroes and treasures ,they are waiting for the player to collect.·Camp, market, equipment store, smithy, notice, businessman, clock tower. Diverse town management gameplay will help you to improve your team.
·Rich and diverse random events，make your choice，get rewards or accept punishment.
·Rich hero skills. Understand the characteristics of each hero and learn skills based on their characteristics, it can perform up to their full capabilities.
·The match between heroes and treasures, heroes and heroes, treasures and treasures, give your strategy choices based on different levels.
·Brand new week gameplay. At the beginning of each adventure, you can choose different heroes, treasures and initial rewards.

Background story

Now swire black dragon has awoken, evil devil gas engulfed the land again. Countless lives can not resist the erosion of the devil gas, becomes demons. People struggling with Death and despair.As the lord of a town, can you gather the warriors scattered around, train them, and finally lead them to defeat the Black Dragon and save this chaotic continent?

For more game updates, help and support, join the QQ group: 792227263
Or feedback on the steam community
detailed_description:
About game save

Game save path: C: \ Users \ {User Name} \ AppData \ Local \ DragonKiller \ Saved {} is the user name of the computer. If there is a problem with the save, please do not close the game and immediately save the backup because the savings will be saved after the game is closed.
Upload to steam cloud.
Added archive backup and automatic restore functions.
The file identified by bk1 is an automatic restoration file. When the archive is broken, it will be automatically restored without manual operation.
The file identified by bk2 is a manually restored file. When the automatic restoration fails, you can manually restore it by modifying the file name.
recovery method for Cloud Archive synchronization error
In order to avoid incorrect coverage of cloud archives caused by some unknown reasons.We have added a local restore method to the archive. If this situation happens, you can restore the archive to a local archive saved by your computer in the following ways.
1. Under the game's archive directory, find the "savegames" folder.
2. Enter "savegames" to find the file with the suffix "backup" corresponding to the archive file.
3. Delete the original archive file and change the suffix name of the corresponding ".backup" file to ".sav".
For example, if you want to restore the first archive to a local archive in endless mode by this way, you need to delete "HHH.sav" and change "HHH.backup" to "HHH.sav".


Direct3D 12 game crash handling

To solve the problem that Direct3D 12 causes the game to crash, you can try the following solutions:
1. Open the game root directory and find Game.exe;
2. Create a shortcut of Game.exe on the desktop;
3. Right-click the shortcut and click Properties;
4. Enter "-DX12" at the end of the ”Target” input box (there is a space in front of "-", don't forget);
5. Then start the game through a shortcut;


Boss key

Alt + D hides the game, Alt + W or CTRL + ALT + E calls out the game.
It may not work if the registry shortcuts conflict.
Close the boss key:
Paste the following content in the "Game.ini" file to close the boss key and it will take effect after restart.
[/script/game.dragonkillerconfig]
OpenBossKey = False
The "Game.ini" file path is as follows:
C: \ Users \ {username} \ AppData \ Local \ DragonKiller \ Saved \ Config \ WindowsNoEditor
({Username} is the user name of the computer)

short_description: No-brainer Heroes is a pixel style semi-idle RPG game. As a lord, you need to run your town, recruit your heroes, defeat level monsters, solve random events, collect powerful treasures, and finally defeat evil dragons.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese
